tatami.core.agent.visualization

Class VisualizableComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.core.agent.AgentComponent
      • tatami.core.agent.visualization.VisualizableComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.xqhs.util.logging.ReportingEntity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimulationAgent

    public class VisualizableComponent
extends AgentComponent
implements net.xqhs.util.logging.ReportingEntity
    This component manages all things related to the visualization and remote control of the agent. Namely:
    • the agent's log
    • reporting the agent's log to the (central) VisualizationAngent (if any)
    • reporting information related to the hierarchical structure of agents
    • handling of orderly exit of agents
    Author:
    Andrei Olaru
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • VisualizableComponent

        public VisualizableComponent()
        Create a new VisualizableComponent instance:
        • Creates a GUI
        • Creates a log, links it to the GUI.
        • Registers message receivers with the MessagingComponent (if any).
        • Registers handlers for agent movement.
        windowType should be set before if a special value is needed

    • Method Detail

      • resetVisualization

        public void resetVisualization()
        Creates the [platform-specific] visualization elements: the GUI and the log.

      • report

        public boolean report(java.lang.String content)
        Reports an update to the log.

        This method will be called by the logging infrastructure, that sees this component as a ReportingEntity.

        Specified by:
        report in interface net.xqhs.util.logging.ReportingEntity
